009package imagingbook.common.color.colorspace;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.max;
012import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.min;
013
014/**
015 * Methods for converting between RGB and HLS color spaces.
016 * This is a singleton class with no public constructors,
017 * use {@link #getInstance()} to obtain the single instance.
018 * <p>
019 * Note: This class is obsolete and has been replaced by {@link HsvColorSpace}.
020 * </p>
021 * 
022 * @author W. Burger
023 * @version 2022/09/03
024*/
025@Deprecated
026public class HsvConverter {
027        
028        private static final HsvConverter instance = new HsvConverter();
029        
030        public static HsvConverter getInstance() {
031                return instance;
032        }
033        
034        private HsvConverter() {        
035        }
036
037        public float[] fromRGB (int[] RGB) {
038                final int R = RGB[0], G = RGB[1], B = RGB[2]; // R,G,B in [0,255]               
039                final int cHi = max(R, G, B);                                   // max. component value
040                final int cLo = min(R, G, B);                                   // min. component value
041                final int cRng = cHi - cLo;                                 // component range
042                //final float cMax = 255.0f;
043                
044                // compute value V
045                float V = cHi / 255.0f;
046                float H = 0, S = 0;
047                
048                // compute saturation S
049                if (cHi > 0)
050                        S = (float) cRng / cHi;
051
052                // compute hue H
053                if (cRng > 0) { // hue is defined only for color pixels
054                        float rr = (float)(cHi - R) / cRng;
055                        float gg = (float)(cHi - G) / cRng;
056                        float bb = (float)(cHi - B) / cRng;
057                        float hh;
058                        if (R == cHi)                   // R is largest component value
059                                hh = bb - gg;
060                        else if (G == cHi)              // G is largest component value
061                                hh = rr - bb + 2;
062                        else                            // B is largest component value
063                                hh = gg - rr + 4;
064                        if (hh < 0)
065                                hh = hh + 6;
066                        H = hh / 6;
067                }
068                return new float[] {H, S, V};
069        }
070        
071        public int[] toRGB (float[] HSV) {
072                final float H = HSV[0], S = HSV[1], V = HSV[2];  // H,S,V in [0,1]
073                final float hh = (6 * H) % 6;                 
074                final int   c1 = (int) hh;                     
075                final float c2 = hh - c1;
076                final float x = (1 - S) * V;
077                final float y = (1 - (S * c2)) * V;
078                final float z = (1 - (S * (1 - c2))) * V;
079                float r = 0, g = 0, b = 0;
080                switch (c1) {
081                        case 0: r = V; g = z; b = x; break;
082                        case 1: r = y; g = V; b = x; break;
083                        case 2: r = x; g = V; b = z; break;
084                        case 3: r = x; g = y; b = V; break;
085                        case 4: r = z; g = x; b = V; break;
086                        case 5: r = V; g = x; b = y; break;
087                        default: // this should not happen
088                }
089                int R = min(Math.round(r * 255), 255);
090                int G = min(Math.round(g * 255), 255);
091                int B = min(Math.round(b * 255), 255);
092                return new int[] {R, G, B};
093        }
094
095}
